questions.question: Is the thermometer depicted in a 3D cartoon style?
questions.explanation: Image B presents a thermometer with three-dimensional features. The depth and shading give it a realistic appearance rather than a cartoon-like one. Commonly, cartoon styles exhibit exaggerated features or simplifications, which are not present here. The detailed and precise rendering aligns more with realistic portrayals.

questions.question: Does the image use soft lighting to highlight the thermometer's metallic finish and clearly visible dial?
questions.explanation: In Image B, soft lighting can be observed through the gentle shadows and highlights on the metal finish of the thermometer, enhancing its three-dimensional look and visibility of details on the dial. This kind of lighting helps bring out the metallic quality and ensures all the markings are legible.

questions.question: Are the stats [Temperature Range +200] and [Accuracy +10°C] clearly incorporated into the image?
questions.explanation: There are no specific stats labeled [Temperature Range +200] and [Accuracy +10°C] in Image B. The visible numbers and indications on the thermometer face specify the regular temperature range, but these precise stats are absent.

questions.question: Is there a title banner at the top labeled "Precision Thermal Gauge"?
questions.explanation: Image B includes a clearly visible title banner at the top, which states 'PRECISION THERMAL GAUGE'. This label suggests an emphasis on accuracy and quality of the instrument.

questions.question: Is there a nameplate at the bottom identifying the item's designation?
questions.explanation: A nameplate is present at the bottom in Image B, which identifies the item with the word 'THERMOMETER'. This serves to classify and provide context to the depicted instrument.

questions.question: Does the image have crisp borders surrounding the card?
questions.explanation: Image B shows a definite border encapsulating the card design. These borders are sharp and distinct, framing the overall content of the image securely.

questions.question: Is the background in cool, professional tones that subtly convey scientific precision?
questions.explanation: The background of Image B is in blue, a color often associated with professionalism, science, and precision. The tonal choice coupled with the rays emerging from the center give a sense of focus and technical detail, which are attributes commonly aligned with scientific instruments.
